name: I hate humans (the goat revenge)
description:
This game was made during Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3

Credits: Ancarvius (programmer), Failed Attempt (artist), Tareq (game and level designer), SharpDock21 (programmer) and HansGretel (music composer).

With his family murdered, the revengeful goat only wishes and lives for one thing: to capture the hunters who ruined his life and make them pay for the deaths of his loved ones.

The game is about just finding and defeating as many hunters as possible, while his life slowly decreases with time. Will you be able to fulfil your revenge or die trying?
